title: The Press Crossed a Line | Guests: Ari Fleischer & Rep. Marshall | 8/24/20
description:
Glenn has a history lesson for Jemele Hill, who compared Nazi Germany to the U.S. Maine wants waiters to wear dog cones to protect from COVID-19. Who’s more threatening: right-wingers in Hawaiian shirts or Antifa with guillotines? Former Bush White House press secretary Ari Fleischer discusses how bad the press has become against Trump. Rep. Roger Marshall was there for the Democrats’ grilling of the postmaster general and argues it’s another hoax. Dr. Karlyn Borysenko is looking for a defamation lawyer after she was evicted from a hotel because staff claimed she was harassing guests. A new document dump proves that schools plan to teach our kids to memorize the Black Panthers’ radical platform – and much more.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
